Package com.ultreon.bubbles.entity

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.bubbles.game.GameObject
com.ultreon.bubbles.entity.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
StateHolder
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bullet, LivingEntity
public abstract class Entity extends GameObject implements StateHolder
Entity base class. The base for all entities, such as the player or a bubble.
Since:
0.0.0
See Also:
  • LivingEntity
  • AbstractBubbleEntity

    • onTeleported

      public void onTeleported(Point2D from, Point2D to)
      Handle when the entity was teleported. To cancel teleport see onTeleporting(Point2D, Point2D)
      Parameters:
      from - teleport origin.
      to - teleport destination.

    • onTeleporting

      public boolean onTeleporting(Point2D from, Point2D to)
      Handle teleporting before it happens. Can be cancelled by returning true.
      Parameters:
      from - teleport origin.
      to - teleport destination.
      Returns:
      true to cancel, false to pass.

    • onCollision

      public abstract void onCollision(Entity other, double deltaTime)
      Handle collision between this entity and another. Note that this is called periodically, but whenever it can.
      Parameters:
      other - the other entity.
      deltaTime - the delta time from the check before this one. (This is for managing correct attack damage for example)

    • size

      public abstract double size()
      Get the size of the entity (counted as the complete size from one end to another end) This is used for collision detection. The collision is meant for circle-shaped entities.
      Returns:
      the entity collision size.
